pr_title: Adds non-null getters to PermissionData and TenantData for the config

timeline.message:
Adds non-null getters to PermissionData and TenantData for the config

The use of getConfig always requires a null-check. This is quite
cumbersome and easily forgotten. This adds a second getter that will
return an empty config instead.

Fixes: SE-9750

Returns a Settings object instead of Config

Often we would create a Settings object manually anyways after checking
the return value of getConfig. This can already be done here.

Fixes: SE-9750

Remove the strict parameter

This should be false is all cases anyway.

Fixes: SE-9750

timeline.bodyText: Sollte das dann hier ned auch die neue Methode nutzen?
timeline.author: sabieber

replies.bodyText: Man braucht die Config an der Stelle, dann braucht man es ja nicht verkomplizieren.
